issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Update README for 0.13.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4926](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4926). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update the README to reflect the new features in 0.13.0, such as parquet support.
